teacheasy.runtime.editor

Class PropertiesUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.runtime.editor.PropertiesUtil

  • public class PropertiesUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to hold functions related to properties initialisation and modification in the editor.
    Version:
    1.0 21 Apr 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers

      • addPropertyField

        public static javafx.scene.control.TextField addPropertyField(java.lang.String id,
                                              java.lang.String text,
                                              javafx.scene.control.TextField textField,
                                              javafx.scene.layout.VBox container,
                                              javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> changeHandler)
        Adds a text field to a property pane controller for changing a specific property.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to set on the text field.
        text - The text to display next to the field.
        textField - The text field object to instantiate.
        container - The container to place the property in.
        changeHandler - The handler for when the value is changed.
        Returns:
        The newly constructed text field.

      • addFileField

        public static javafx.scene.control.Button addFileField(java.lang.String id,
                                       java.lang.String text,

                                       javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> pressHandler)
        Adds a 'file' field to a property pane controller to allow a source file to be changed.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to set on the button.
        text - The text to display next to the button.
        button - The button object to instantiate.
        container - The container to place the property in.
        pressHandler - The handler for when the button is pressed.
        Returns:
        The newly constructed button.

      • addBooleanField

        public static javafx.scene.control.CheckBox addBooleanField(java.lang.String id,
                                            java.lang.String text,
                                            javafx.scene.control.CheckBox checkBox,
                                            javafx.scene.layout.VBox container,
                                            javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> pressHandler)
        Adds a boolean field to a property pane controller to allow a boolean property to be changed. Takes check box form.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to set on the check box.
        text - The text to display next to the check box.
        checkBox - The check box to instantiate.
        container - The container to place the property in.
        pressHandler - The handler for when the check box is pressed.
        Returns:
        The newly constructed check box.

      • addColorField

        public static javafx.scene.control.ColorPicker addColorField(java.lang.String id,
                                             java.lang.String text,

                                             javafx.scene.layout.VBox container,
                                             javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> changeHandler)
        Adds a color picker to a property pane controller to allow a color property to be changed.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to set on the color picker.
        text - The text to display next to the color picker.
        picker - The color picker to instantiate.
        container - The container to place the property in.
        changeHandler - The handler for when the color picker is pressed.
        Returns:
        The newly constructed Color Picker.

        Adds a combo box picker to a property pane controller to allow a typed property to be changed.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to set on the combo box.
        text - The text to display next to the combo box.
        comboBox - The combo box to instantiate.
        container - The container to place the property in.
        selectionHandler - The handler for when the combo box is changed.
        Returns:
        The newly constructed combo box.

      • validatePosition

        public static float validatePosition(java.lang.String str,
                     float defaultVal)
        Validates a newly entered position value.
        Parameters:
        str - The value entered as a string.
        defaultVal - The default value to return if the entered value is invalid.
        Returns:
        Either the entered value as a float, or the default value.

      • validateFloat

        public static float validateFloat(java.lang.String str,
                  float defaultVal)
        Validates a newly entered float value.
        Parameters:
        str - The value entered as a string.
        defaultVal - The default value to return if the entered value is invalid.
        Returns:
        Either the entered value as a float, or the default value.

              int defaultVal)
        Validates a newly entered integer value.
        Parameters:
        str - The value entered as a string.
        defaultVal - The default value to return if the entered value is invalid.
        Returns:
        Either the entered value as a integer, or the default value.

      • validateFile

        public static java.lang.String validateFile(java.lang.String defaultVal,
                            java.lang.String filterTitle,
                            java.lang.String... fileTypes)
        Handles choosing a new source file.
        Parameters:
        defaultVal - The value to be returned if the file cannot be opened.
        filterTitle - The title of the file extension filter.
        fileTypes - A collection of file types for the filter.
        Returns:
        Either the path of the new file, or the path of the default file.
